subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Funny Cide will remain at Barclay Tagg’s stable at Belmont Park and will be converted to a stable pony, accompanying his former stablemates to the track each morning during training hours.
snippet: Funny Cide will remain at Barclay Tagg’s stable at Belmont Park and will be converted to a stable pony, accompanying his former stablemates to the track each morning during training hours.
